file_content.text: We're pulling out of Belsavis. Section X is still on lockdown.
Section X, Belsavis. Commander Nol's expecting you.
You! You released the Dread Masters! It's all your fault!
The Dread Masters are coming! They'll destroy us all! Even you!
Feel the grip of the Wrath. Speak another word out of turn, and it will be your last.
Quiet, worm. [Force Choke]
Apologies, Wrath. Don't expect any more trouble out of that one.
You dare address a Dark Council member in that tone?
Silence! [Shock him]
Apologies, my lord. I'll see that he's disciplined.
Keep your hands to yourself.
Shut up! [Punch]
Good one, hunter. Won't get any more lip out of that one.
We can't have you stirring up panic.
Quiet! [Punch]
Sorry, sir. Won't happen again.
Who are the Dread Masters?
Dread Masters?
Sith! The greatest horrors the galaxy's ever seen!
Your kind will get nowhere with the Empire if you parade around like a raving lunatic.
You're setting a bad example.
None of that will matter when the Dread Masters arrive!
Sorry about that.
Hysterical and stupid. This is what the Empire gets for accepting aliens into its ranks.
Typical alien.
Can't say I disagree.
These are alien recruits, just freed from Belsavis. They're worked up for good reason.
It's chaos on Belsavis. Something about the Sith Dread Masters. The Imperial Guard's locked the site and issued a summons for your aid.
I freed the Dread Masters from Belsavis. If this concerns them, I'll put an end to it.
I'll do what I can.
First good news I've heard all day.
Tell the Imperial Guard I'm on my way.
I'll do what I can.
They'll be glad to hear it.
Everyone keeps talking about "Dread Masters." Why are they a threat?
What are the Dread Masters?
Word has it they drive armies mad with fear. No idea what they're doing back on Belsavis.
Have these Sith turned against the Empire?
The Dread Masters rebelled?
Can't say. But whatever they're up to, it's bad news for everyone.
Commander Nol's the Imperial Guardsman in charge. You'll find him in Section X of Belsavis, heart of the chaos.
Everything's under control here.
